book.synopsis: Strong-willed and beautiful Scottish warrior Seonaid Dumbar is ordered by King Henry to marry Englishman Blake Sherwell and leads her new husband on a merry chase when she flees to a new stronghold, planning to wage war on his heart. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.45 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
